name: Take Note
description:
A short game for the GMTK Game Jam, where you follow Lee M. through one day of his life. The game is currently a little broken, but still very playable! Expect updates soon!

Liam Cristello: Programming

Becca Malcolm: Level design and art assets

Miranda Juncos: Character design and animation

Jack LR: Background and house assets

Cameron Perry: Narrative and programming
